title: First Time installing LoL PVP.net patcher kernel has stopped working
body:
Hey everyone. 
I've played League of Legends a few times at the net cafe and thought I might install it on my computer. I install the game and open up the launcher and straight away I get the patcher kernel error. 
I've tried looking up the solution on the forums and tried multiple methods; opening as admin, opening as admin from the file location, etc.
Because its the first time I open the game, I have no patches to delete either and reinstall doesn't solve the problem. 
My specs are:
Windows 7 Ultimate 64-bit SP1
Intel Core i5-4460 CPU @3.2GHz
8GB RAM
NVIDIA GeForce GTX960

Thank you in advance

replies.body: This kernel error is usually caused by a security setting preventing the patcher from launching.  Go over the steps in our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to get that fixed up.  Let me know if you run into any trouble!
